attributes.action: Abolish Road Fund Licence for Motorcycles, Scooters, Mopeds, tricycles and Motor cars under 1000cc, to activley promote thier use to help bring about a reduction in carbon emissions, and wear and tear on the road infrastructure.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This measure will also mean that increased use of these vehicles will reduce congestion and enable more of them to be parked in a smaller space..
E.G. 5 x Motorcycles in the space of one 4x4!
